tidbits.title: Low-Lying Country
tidbits.description: The Netherlands is known for its flat landscape, with about a quarter of the country below sea level and a complex system of dikes and canals.

tidbits.title: Tulips and Windmills
tidbits.description: The country is famous for its tulip fields in spring, picturesque windmills, historic cities like Amsterdam, and extensive cycling paths.

tidbits.title: Progressive Policies
tidbits.description: The Netherlands is known for progressive policies, including a strong focus on sustainable development, LGBTQ+ rights, and social welfare.
